source_caption_data.pre_caption: This video features a scenic view of a winding river bordered by a road and dense, leafless trees, likely in late autumn or early winter. The landscape extends into the distance with a clear sky overhead. There is no significant subject motion in the scene.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.initial_feedback: There is a white car driving on the road
source_caption_data.gpt_feedback: The video includes a white car driving along the road adjacent to the river.
source_caption_data.final_feedback: The video includes a white car driving along the road adjacent to the river.
source_caption_data.gpt_caption: This video features a scenic view of a winding river bordered by a road and dense, leafless trees, likely in late autumn or early winter. A white car is driving along the road adjacent to the river. The landscape extends into the distance with a clear sky overhead.

A white car is driving along the road adjacent to the river. The landscape extends into the distance with a clear sky overhead.
